'''Hunt Down the Abyss Mage''' is a [[Quest Domain]] during [[Jean]]'s [[Story Quest]] [[Leo Minor Chapter]]: Act I - [[Master's Day Off]] quest "[[Master's Day Off (Quest)|Master's Day Off]]".

==Trial Character==
* As you approach the first entryway, the Abyss Mage will detonate an exploding barrel and badly injure you. Afterwards, [[Jean]] will join your party as a trial character.
** You can detonate the barrel from the distance and avoid the damage, but the dialogue will still act as if you got hurt.

==Chests==
* Common chest ×2 (along the ledge after the first room; behind the rock wall in the room where you need to push the Hilichurls into the water)
* Exquisite chest ×2 (in the room on the right-hand side of the Hilichurl-water area; high up on the top of a domain structure guarded by Hilichurl Archers<ref>HoYoLAB: [https://www.hoyolab.com/article/252486 <nowiki>[V1.4 Guide]</nowiki> Super Top Secret Exquisite Chest in Jean's Story Quest]</ref>)
* Precious chest ×1 (after completing domain)

==Notes==
* The Abyss Mage will spawn an endless amount of Cryo Slimes during your battle against it. The only way to end the battle is by defeating the Mage itself.
